title: Status quo on Coastal Energen resolution challenged
description: A consortium of Adani Power and Dickey Alternative Investment Trust has approached the Supreme Court to challenge an NCLAT order that directed them to maintain the status quo on implementing a resolution plan for Coastal Energen. The Supreme Court will hear the matter on Thursday, following concerns about due process and financial gains.
